placeholderImages.description: Edit the background to show the user posing confidently with a Formula E car (example reference image of a GenBeta car has been attached) in the unique indoor section of the London E-Prix at ExCeL, with the car's sleek lines and electric glow highlighted against the track.

Create a celebratory image of the user standing on the top step of a Formula E podium. They are holding a winner's trophy high in the air as sustainable, branded confetti rains down around them. The background should show a cheering, blurred crowd and Formula E and Google Cloud branding in the background(an example of the branding has been attached). The user should be clearly visible and their expression should be one of pure joy and victory.

Create a 1/6 scale commercialized figurine of the user as a Formula E driver in a full race suit (without the helmet), performing a celebratory pose (e.g., arms raised, fist pump) in a realistic style, in a Formula E pit garage environment. The figurine is placed on a computer desk. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base, with no text on the base. The content on the computer screen is the ZBrush modeling process of this figurine. Next to the computer screen is a BANDAI-style toy packaging box printed with the original artwork. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations of the driver and their car.

Place the user in the cockpit of a Formula E GenBeta car (the example reference image of a Gen3 car has also been attached), wearing a full race suit (no helmet), with a dynamic, blurred background of the Berlin E-Prix section during a race lap. The car's details should be clearly visible. The person's entire face (including eyes and mouth) must be completely uncovered and visible, specifically not blocked by the car's steering wheel or any part of the vehicle, by adjusting the camera angle to show the face clearly from above the steering wheel.

Integrate the user standing naturally and clearly visible in front of a pristine Formula E GenBeta car (the example reference image of a Gen3 car has been attached) on the grid of the Mexico City E-Prix, with the vibrant track markings and grandstands visible behind them. The car's details should be in sharp focus, and there should only be one car.

Seamlessly edit the user into a high-tech Formula E garage, positioned as a team principal looking intently at a data screen showing race telemetry. The user should be wearing team-style headphones around their neck. In the background, a Formula E Gen3 car (the Gen3 car reference image has been attached)is being prepped by engineers in unbranded team gear. The lighting should be focused and professional.

Place the user in the cockpit of a Formula E GenBeta car (the example reference image of a Gen3 car has also been attached), wearing a full race suit (no helmet), with a dynamic background of the vibrant Sao Paulo race track during a race lap. The car's details should be clearly visible. The person's entire face (including eyes and mouth) must be completely uncovered and visible, specifically not blocked by the car's steering wheel or any part of the vehicle, by adjusting the camera angle to show the face clearly from above the steering wheel.

Integrate the user into the unique atmosphere of the Diriyah E-Prix night race. The user is standing beside a Formula E Gen3 car(the example reference image of a Gen3 has been attached), which is parked under the vibrant trackside floodlights. In the background, the historic and beautifully illuminated At-Turaif district is visible. The scene should be dramatic and full of contrast between the ancient architecture and the futuristic technology. The user should also be clearly visible

Place the user on the bustling streets of Tokyo, with a Formula E car (as provided with the attached image of a Gen3 car) racing past in a blur of motion. The iconic neon lights and skyscrapers of the city should form a vibrant, futuristic backdrop. The user is looking towards the camera with a slight smile, capturing a moment of excitement during the inaugural Tokyo E-Prix. The user should also be clearly visible
